name: marketingby-healthcare-platform
description: Healthcare Marketing Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && VITE_API_BASE_URL=/api npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.copy:frontend: rm -rf backend/dist/public && mkdir -p backend/dist/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/dist/public/
